name: PKCE Demo
description: Web application designed to showcase the OAuth2 Code grant type with PKCE extension.

name: Fuel availability tracker (SriLanka)
description: Simple web application designed to track fuel availability at gas stations.

name: Experimenting web workers with React
description: Experimental web app for utilizing web worker threads in React. This app is designed to test asynchronous message passing between a worker thread and a React application running in the main event loop. It utilizes the onmessage event with a React hook

name: Streaming Graph partitioner
description: A slightly modified version of the Fennel algorithm and the Linear Deterministic Greedy (LDG) partitioning algorithm to effectively process a continuous stream of edges, which consists of a pair of vertices.

name: Simple Tic Tac Toe Game
description: Simple Tic Tac Toe game to try out React basics

name: Automatically translate React-intl locale files
description: Automatically translate language files using Google or Yandex Translator.

name: Micro-frontend with Webpack
description: Showcase React dynamic module loading with Suspense and Webpack 5 Module Federation feature

name: Solar energy monitor
description: Monitoring and management system for off-grid hybrid inverters.

name: Personal Website(this)
description: This website utilizes Next.js for server-side rendering (SSR) and Material-UI (MUI) as the component library. It employs SandPack for code emulation, Giscus for blog section commenting, and MDX/Remark for code snippet highlighting.
